attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an effort to encourage localisation which will reduce the impact of society on the environment, and particularly to reduce travel & transport and all the CO2 emissions that go with it, we ask the Prime Minister to ban the wheel. This will also benefit health as everyone will have to walk, and will reduce accidents thus saving  the NHS lots of money.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
